website_summaries.verdict: Women with fuller figures will find this bra to be quite comfortable and supportive -- once they get the correct size.
pros: Unlike most competitors, this bra comes in extended sizes
The result is a comfortable fit for larger-chested women
cons: This bra tends to run on the small size
Many women found it necessary to size up at least one, if not two, full sizes to get a comfortable fit

customer_reviews.title: Definitely buying more.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my wife, she is a 42F. I read through the reviews and decided to get her the 4x size and she loves it. Probably could have gotten smaller but she doesn't like it too tight. She wants me to order more. Material is very breathable also she says.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Neely

customer_reviews.title: Size chart
customer_reviews.text: The “size chart” available for this product at the time I ordered showed no correlation to the bra sizes available for purchase. I decided to try it anyway and ordered the largest size (6X), hopeful that it would fit. It does not, unfortunately. That said, it looks like a quality product. It’s soft and stretchy. Seems well-made. Unfortunately, it’s just not my size. Wish they made them bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Wordsmith

customer_reviews.title: way too small
customer_reviews.text: I am a gal who has a 42 inch bust, which is about a 1X....but I like things large and not binding. I ordered a 4X with the idea it would be a comfy fitting bra. WAS I SURPRISED! I had to wrestle this thing on. I am considering sending it back. I would have ordered a 5X, but that may be too small also.
customer_reviews.author: Al Grassl

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Comfy, but sized EXTREMELY Small!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comfortable bra to wear around the house, but it is sized EXTREMELY small! I normally wear a large - Xtra large blouse and 38C or D bra. This bra is a 5X! It measures about 12-1/2" wide at bottom edge when laying flat. It does stretch and is made well, but is NOT even close to size! Personally, I'm embarrassed the size is printed on the bra and hope I'm never in a predicament that ANYONE else SEE the size!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely small!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a size 18, 40G in bras. Because of the reviews on here, I bought a 4x, but it's still a bit snug (in the band, not just in the cups). The band does have a tendency to roll up. It stretches a lot, but when I pulled it out of the box, I thought it looked like a size large! I kind of wish I had gone with the 5x. If you normally wear a bra band larger than 42 inches, I wouldn't recommend this one at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Horrible sizing, tight compression at least 2 sizes small :(
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing JMS Pure Comfort pullover bras in Private Jet, Atomic Blue & Over the Taupe Diamond Fabric for years & the Sparkle Blue Fabric is stiff with no stretch or give at all. There is so little room in the cups that my breasts are squished to the center. The Sparkle Blue 5x is smaller than the Pure Comfort Atomic Blue Diamond 3x that I couldn't wear (I had to switch to a 5x for a looser underband) Because of an old injury I cannot wear any bra that compresses my ribs along the underband beneath my breasts.
customer_reviews.author: Catitude

customer_reviews.title: Comfort A+
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bra just to wear around the house. It's amazingly comfortable, almost as comfy as no bra, but I have kids and enough decency not to let the girls be fully free while I'm cooking dinner and doing housework! It's easy on, easy off. I bought the 4x, it's a little big, so I'm getting the 3x next. I go on girls trips, this would be great to sleep in! I love it. If you're looking for a wearing out support bra, this is not the bra for you...if your looking for.comfort and just enough support to not feel like your girls are going to knock over your kid when you pick them up, then this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: T. Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable for sleep or lounging at home.
customer_reviews.text: I love these bras! I am a 44DDD and I wear a 2x in these. I wear them as a sleep bra or a lounge bra at home. I have had other brands and the straps were way too long and they didn't last. I have MS and I think it's harder to put on a traditional bra with clasp than this bra. I basically live in these because I don't go out much and just want to be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Gally

customer_reviews.title: Soooooo comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I read the reviews before I ordered. The item runs small but WOW it is comfortable. I'm a 42DDD and the 3X worked like a charm. Using the step in and pull up method of putting it on works best and I'm shocked at the level of support it provides. I'm ordering another 1 or 2.
customer_reviews.author: KNS

customer_reviews.title: Rolls up.
customer_reviews.text: Big disappointment for a person with plus-sized band but without plus-sized cup measurement! Rolls up over bust immediately. It might be better if camisole-length--that couldn't roll so easily. There's almost no support and no "modesty" coverage. A more comfortable bra that stays in place without underwire (so far) is my new "Leading Lady Women's Plus Size Bralette," but have yet to see how it wears over time.
customer_reviews.author: bts

customer_reviews.title: Big mistake in buying this
customer_reviews.text: When I tried on this bra today, I didn't even have it on for one minute to know that it was headed straight for the garbage. It was like having on a rubber band. I thought that they must have had a very petite woman pose with the bra on because the bra did not go below my breast as much as in the picture. It did not feel comfortable at on, in fact I have sports bras that are more comfortable than this one. It isn't because I am top heavy either, because I'm not. If I remember correctly this is made with 95% nylon.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Just My Size Comfort Plus Size Bra
customer_reviews.text: This bra is definitely comfortable, easy to put on and has the support just like any of the other sports bras. I bought this because in the small town I live in, there aren’t any choices but to go online. I had looked on many online stores but had never found the brand I usually buy which is Just My Size brand. This bra fits just as advertised and I will buy more when I get s chance. If anyone is a Plus Size, this bra might be the one for you!
customer_reviews.author: AZ Megan

customer_reviews.title: Sizes are off
customer_reviews.text: ORDERED A 5X TO FIT 50~52. APPARENTLY PLUS SIZE BRA DESIGNERS DON'T QUIT GRASP THAT THE BRA ONLY STRETCHES SO FAR AND NO FURTHER. AND THAT WOULD BE WITH THE HELP OF ANOTHER PERSON, NOT ME ALONE. IT CAN'T STRETCH FROM, WHAT, 12" TO 52 ". SERIOUSLY. IF I DID GET IT ON, I WOULD NEVER GET IT OFF AGAIN WITHOUT THAT AFOREMENTIONED PERSON. YOU'D THINK PLUS SIZE COMPANIES WOULD KNOW THIS. MY HEART SANK WHEN I OPENED THE PACKAGE TO SEE THE USUAL HEAD BANDANA (AS ANOTHER COMMENTOR MENTIONED!) I LONG FOR A COMFORTABLE STRETCH PULL OVER BRA....
customer_reviews.author: ALF

customer_reviews.title: It does the job!
customer_reviews.text: I am writing this because when I was looking I didn’t see any reviews for my breast size. I am a 42 G.. (At Lane Bryant and City Chic) occasionally an 40-42 H at boutiques.. I ordered a 4X and it’s fits perfect! It gives minimal support, but just enough to feel supported lounging around the house as we are all doing during this crisis. I wouldn’t recommend going smaller. But you could go one size up and I imagine it’ll still fit..
customer_reviews.author: Erin V.

customer_reviews.title: Love these! Comfortable but runs very small.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. Something that I can wear at home or out that allows me to continue that braless feeling so many of us have been enjoying during Coronavirus. One word of caution however. It is nowhere near a True Fit. I normally wear a 1X but I took the warnings on here seriously and ordered a 5X. I'm an A/B cup. It fits perfectly and covers up the side roll that I have. I just went back and ordered 10 more in a nude color.
customer_reviews.author: K. M. Noel

customer_reviews.title: Worth the effort to buy a much larger size than indicated.
customer_reviews.text: I have COPD and was searching for an alternative to my usual support bra that I could wear for lounging and sleep. I had tried three other companies for a similar item to this without success. Several of the previous customer reviews of this bra pointed out the fact that the size ran very small. The price was reasonable and returns to Amazon are accommodating so I took a chance and ordered the largest size available. It was three sizes larger than I usually wear. The result was a marvelously comfortable garment perfect for my needs. There is enough support for home use even though the girls are definitely large. I have since orders three more.
customer_reviews.author: mswsred

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and fit great
customer_reviews.text: I’ve worn these for a long time. Now they need replacing. The comfort is amazing. They’re sturdy. They hold in place what they’re supposed to. I’m a Grammy with a toddler and newborn to care for, I don’t need to be dressed up for an office, but they’d work for that too. The strap in the back is wide enough not to give me fat bubbles on the top and bottom.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Better than I hoped for!
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying I'm a 42J and the 5X was a good fit. These types of bras don't offer a lot of support but they are great for lazy days around the house and you don't want to flop everywhere. These offer more coverage and support than the ahh bras do though. If i have to run to town I just throw a sports bra over it and I'm good. They are so comfy that I'm buying several more.
customer_reviews.author: Nikol

customer_reviews.title: For the price very nice
customer_reviews.text: The materials are not the same for all colors. I have had most of the colors. The beige ones are so thin and have extreme stretch. I have to wear two of those together for any support. The blue and black (in the solid material not the design) are still stretchy but they are thicker and firmer, more supportive for large breasts. I have learned how to put them on but still occasionally get stuck with the log roll of fabric that’s ridiculously hard to fix without removing and starting over. Once on they are extremely comfortable and I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Tina L

customer_reviews.title: Too stretchy in all the wrong places
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 42H and after reading the reviews, I begrudgingly purchased a 3X, despite my instinct telling me that’d be way too small. Boy was I wrong! This thing is so stretchy/weak/big, it provides no hold at all. The cup size seems right, but the band and shoulder straps are so stretchy that it basically looks like I’m wearing nothing, but digs into my shoulders because of the lack of support. I wanted this as a house lounge bra, so I wasn’t looking for great support, but I certainly expected more than NO support. Sizing chart is useless, I’d probably be better off with a smaller size, but I’m not risking it again.
customer_reviews.author: Karyn C

customer_reviews.title: Strange Fit
customer_reviews.text: Ugh. I bought two of these because I loved the ones I had gotten a couple of years ago at Walmart. When I saw these on Amazon, I jumped at the chance to get a couple more. These new ones, however, are made very differently from my older bras. The new ones are much, much shorter so that every time I lift my arms the bottom of the bra rides up to my armpits. They seem to be wider and shorter. The band at the bottom is so wide that it just won't stay under my breasts where it belongs. I hate these new constructions.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia F. Grunwaldt

customer_reviews.title: Ok Bra
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. The material is thinner than the ones you used to buy in Kmart. There is zero nipple coverage. I ordered a 2x based on what others said and it is too big. I normally wear a 40-42 DD. So I reordered a smaller size. Because the material is so thin I ordered these-- I think the smaller size will support better, so all in all I am happy with the purchase. No underwire, no pinching or binding and with the added inserts I ordered, I am happy
customer_reviews.author: AnnaB

customer_reviews.title: Very thin material with no support
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this bra, but the material is extremely thin. When I first took it out of the package it was SO TINY that I was sure they had sent the wrong size, but I tried it on and it DID, indeed, "stretch to fit". Sadly, once it stretches to fit, the material is SO THIN that you might as well not wear a bra at all. In addition, the bottom portion of the bra doesn't really stretch enough - so it is very tight while the rest of the coverage is too loose. Don't waste your money. You can buy less expensive bras that are better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Trick To Sizing!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bras! Found my regular, blouse size on these types of bras, to be too tight. Now, I order 2-sizes-too-big, b/c they will stretch just to my body shape, and are so much easier to put on, and fit more comfortably. These do not have modesty pads, which I have found to be a nightmare, anyway, so I purchased stick-on pads, which work great. These bras are very comfortable, and wash well, plus, larger sizes are available, and not sold-out all the time, as with other brands. Pleased with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: S. MCGUIRE

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to put on, and very thin
customer_reviews.text: Do not recommend, unless you just want a hair band to cover your boobs. Nipple show through and if you did get it on, it can be comfortable, but it will shrink in wash, so buy a size larger if you can. For me, will not be keeping as I bought 4, they will not hold up to the average wear and tear of daily wearing. Going on vacation, and want a disable bra, this maybe just what you are looking for. I prefer a longer wear love the seamless approach though, this could be a great bra if better material was used.
customer_reviews.author: Carol S.

customer_reviews.title: Runs very small!
customer_reviews.text: I think in the correct size, it will be very comfortable. I wear a 38C typically in bras and I ordered the 1X. The band was really tight, I felt like I had indigestion. I'm going to try two sizes larger. UPDATE: I bought the 3X and it is the right size. I am 5'9", 147lbs. and wear a bra size 38 B/C.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S.

customer_reviews.title: Order up one size, IMHO
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 52B. Using the description on the back of the package I ordered a 5X. It is very small looking when you take it out of the package. It DOES stretch. But not enough for me. I will try to wear it and "break it in. Even though it's kind of snug right now it is still very breathable and very comfortable. I WILL order another one, and this time get size 6X.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jones

customer_reviews.title: Will work for my purpose
customer_reviews.text: I bought this just to wear under a swim shirt. I ordered the 2X for a normal bra size of 44C by the chart. When I first opened it I thought their chart could not be right, it looked quite small. But once I got it on, it was just right. It has a lot of stretch, so it was not difficult to get on. Although it is not quite as supportive as my typical bras, it is going to work quite well for swimming and looks good under my swim shirt with not too much sagging for my old lady boobs.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and light-weight bra for individuals who wear larger sized bras
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable bra. It provides a light weight support and works well under my summer tank tops. It does not ride up or roll like some other manufacturers' products. It is easy to wash, I just put it in the wash with my other whites and I throw it into the dryer and holds its shape. This bra does not have the padded inserts, which is a plus for me. I always have issues with them not holding their shape or not staying in place. Nice bra, I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable. I bought them for lazy days since my ...
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable. I bought them for lazy days since my fibro often precludes my wearing of my favored underwire bras. The girls need support and these provide just enough to keep from hanging while cradling and comforting the rest of me.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly J. Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Most comfy bra I've ever had!
customer_reviews.text: Soft and fits great. Keep in mind I wear a 48 c and had to buy a 5x for a perfect fit, but I LOVE this bra. I have always hated bras even though I don't have much to brag about, and can even go braless with the right shirt on a very casual day. I needed something to wear to church and work that was comfy and this is definitely it. I would order a size or 2 or more larger than you think to be on the safe side. Very stretchy and soft even after washing. Tumble dry low or air dry only. Will definitely buy some more!
customer_reviews.author: keleen carlson

customer_reviews.title: Comfy kween.
customer_reviews.text: Love the bra! Great fabric not too harsh on me and it does feel a little tight but that's fine I probably just ordered the wrong one. Still good use!
customer_reviews.author: Aura

customer_reviews.title: My girls are HAPPY!
customer_reviews.text: It is really hard for me to find something that is both comfortable and actually does what a bra is supposed to and keep the girls in line. This does both so very well. I can wear for long time spans without my back or shoulders hurting and without constantly having to adjust. And for the price? This bra is such a rare find I want to buy 10 more just because!
customer_reviews.author: Kay-Dee AgonoyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Definitely runs small. I wear an extra large to 1x, more for overall size as l am not huge busted. I ordered XL and was able to get it on but had to give it a few good tugs to get into place. Once on it stayed in place but not nearly as comfy as other brands that l own.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Zarrella

customer_reviews.title: Best I have found!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 42ddd and had to return the one I purchased by the size chart and go down one. The 1x ended up fitting my the best. With that said, I wanted something comfortable to wear during these hot summer months around the house, at the lake, ect. I have tried 4 different brands and this one is the best for me. It fit me the best and gave the best support of all the ones I tried. It is very comfortable and will try to get other colors.
customer_reviews.author: littlefriend

customer_reviews.title: Will NEVER buy again. Worthless.
customer_reviews.text: I first bought the blue one. Loved it so I bought 2 white and 1 beige. Threw them away. Weren’t even worth the trouble to return or donate. Every time I lifted my arms above my head my boobs would slide out the bottom. This has never once happened with the blue one. Was I ever in private when it happened? Of course not so now I’m trying to get my free boobs back in without anyone noticing. You larger women know what I’m talking about. It’s funny now. Not so much at the time.
customer_reviews.author: Joni Moore

customer_reviews.title: Sizing
customer_reviews.text: I got this bra last month and ordered according to the 5XL chart that was available at that time and it fit perfect. Now this order was for the same but it was so small there was no way I was going to get it on. Not sure if there is a resolution for this problem. The band on the first one measured flat 16.5 inches. The band on this one laying flat like the others measured 13 inches. That's a 7 inch difference in circumference and substantial difference on larger sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Debra R. Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Comfort but zero support
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to wear after I have shoulder surgery (one arm for a while will be hard to hook my other bras). I wore this one after I received it to see if I would like it. It is very comfortable, but if you are a bigger cup woman (DD-DDD) you are just about going without a bra. There is zero support so you bounce and lay low under your shirts. I would really love this bra if it just had a little lift support to it (could be convinced to throw away the conventional bra then).
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Bernhardt

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously small - 26" unstretched 4X. 2 stars due to size.
customer_reviews.text: I'm trying to find a really comfy minimal bra for wearing around the house. I measure as 38D (38" under breasts & 42 over breasts). I bought a 4X which is for someone who is 48" around - 6" larger than my size! It is too tight for my purposes. Flat on a surface it is 13" wide on one side, unstretched, so 26" total. How can anyone expect someone who is 48" around stretch this comfortably? or is that people who design bras not care how they feel? Annoyed.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Size up but once you do great
customer_reviews.text: I listened to other reviewers who advised to size up and glad I did. I wear a 40C and 1x clothing. I bought three bras in size 3x and they are perfect and comfortable. I bought these due to a recent bilateral masectomy and needed something soft and that would stretch after my breast reconstruction. These also held a towel for when I had some drainage issues after the surgery. They will be great for just use as a supportive bra long after the cancer stuff goes away. Great item for great price!!
customer_reviews.author: DMG

customer_reviews.title: Great color & comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: The fuchsia is a great color! It doesn't provide a ton of support, but is very comfortable under your workout tops. I bought a few different soft bras like this, and this was the best one by far. I found it very helpful that there is no hook closure either in the front or in the back! And it slips on with no problem whatsoever. I am going to buy a few more colors because it's really useful to my yoga workouts!
customer_reviews.author: sofia meyen

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy
customer_reviews.text: If you want to wear something around the house that is super comfy this is a great item. Mind you for those with a large bust, this DOES NOT provide any support, just coverage. Given that fact this is excellent to wear underneath tank tops, low cut tops or tops made with really deep armholes. It provides nice coverage and doesn't bind. The band does roll up a little though but it is never uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Love2Cook

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but difficult to get on
customer_reviews.text: I got this for sleeping, which will work great. Its pretty comfortable and stretchy. When I took it out of the package I thought there was no way it would fit but it does. Id suggest going up a size though. There isn't much support, but again for sleeping its fine. This is one of the most difficult bras I have EVER tried to struggle into though. It's thin and pretty hard to get the sides and back down. Once you get it on its great!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn H

customer_reviews.title: Not as small as you think!  Give it a try.
customer_reviews.text: I love this bra. I am a very large woman and was concerned when I read the reviews saying it was really small but I ordered it anyway. When it came I was speechless at how small it appeared. I ordered the 6x size and it looked like it would fit a 00 sized person. I read the materials and it has spandex in it and it's very stretchy. I put it on and to my surprise I fits perfectly. It supports and is so comfortable. I will never use a different bra again!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Anne Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Comfy & Smooths Back Fat!
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 38DD and the 2X fit me perfectly. It's SO COMFORTABLE! The reason I bought it was to see if it smoothed out my back fat - it actually does. And much easier than exercising. Ha ha. I didn't give it a full 5-stars only because it doesn't come with removable pads and if I wear a thinner shirt, you can see my centerpieces poking out, if you catch my drift! But I stuck in some pads from another bra. If you're looking for enormous support, probably not the best bra for ya.
customer_reviews.author: DeAnn Murray

customer_reviews.title: Sooo comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: i’d like to order other colors! it is so comfy and gives my large bust support!! it also smooths out my back fat! but no other colors are listed. sob!
customer_reviews.author: D'Lee C.

customer_reviews.title: Light support, great comfort.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 42 inch bust, and the 3x was very comfortable. It's a perfect lounging and sleeping bra, and it's perfectly appropriate to wear in public with looser-fitting clothes. Just bear in mind it's loose-fitting support, like having your chest in control-top nylon cups, so it doesn't minimize "bounce". But I love wearing it at home when I'd like to feel dressed for the day without getting the irritation you might get from wearing a regular bra for hours. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ladylove72

customer_reviews.title: I didn’t expect it to fit but it does!  I am ordering another.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t expect it to fit but it does! I am ordering another. I wear a 46 I (eye) bra. I hate to wear a bra around the house. This keeps a modicum of modesty and offers some support. And, it’s comfortable. I couldn’t ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable bra ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable bra I've ever owned. Light support. Doesn't cut or dig in. Wicks away moisture. Colorfast, easy to wash on gentle cycle or in the sink. Hang to dry. I've bought one in every color and extras in neutrals. Some have been washed over 20 times with no signs of wear.
customer_reviews.author: E. Williams

customer_reviews.title: This is a PERFECT bra. Try it, thank me later : )
customer_reviews.text: These are the MOST COMFORTABLE Bras in existence! !! I found them by accident at a local shop and since I wear this all the time. COMFY, and support, and works for both Sports or the Office (I wear them to both). This is a PERFECT bra. Try it, thank me later : ) Note: The price on Amazon is HALF the price in a shop, grab them while it lasts. SIZING TIP: Order a Size larger than you wear and it will be PERFECT. (JustMySize runs smaller than the size across the board)
customer_reviews.author: CD3748

customer_reviews.title: Yes, I found it!
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased this type of bra about 6 years ago and have not been able to find it again. The only thing the has changed is the support is a little bit lighter that my old one. I am 250 lbs. 5'6" and a 5X fit just right. Will be getting a couple more. I had breast cancer and one removed with no reconstruction and it works great with one shoulder on and the other folded down.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Pure Comfort!
customer_reviews.text: This bra is perfectly named -- PURE COMFORT! Of all the bras (including sports bras) I've owned, this is the most comfortable bra I have ever owned. It also does an A++++++ job of wicking off sweat! When I take it off at the end of the day, I can't tell the difference. But don't let that fool you -- the support is wonderful! My boobs stay in place. Thank you SO much JMS for creating such an impeccable bra! Oh, and I'm a size 58F and the 6X fits heavenly!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Pure comfort
customer_reviews.text: This is such a comfortable bra. I am elderly, couldn't care less about lift, and this bra gives control and comfort, with just enough lift to be able to wear for sleep or just all day comfort. I tried other bras like this, and they have all been skimpy and too tight. This is sized for us larger women, and is actually as advertised. I will buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Linda M

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This bra isn't for me, because I have very big boobies. It's comfortable though. I decided to keep it and wear when I'm at home. Not very supportive, but again this is for females that don't really need awhole lot of support. I read some of the reviews and for those that said it's flimsy remember this isn't a sports bra. I gave it 5 stars because it's everything it describes. I usually have a hard time finding bras that fit me, but this fits just fine. So for me it was true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Rasvin

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable lounge bra
customer_reviews.text: I wish I hadn't listened to the many "runs way too small" reviews because if I had ordered my size it would have fit perfectly, I'm sure. However, they still feel great and are super comfortable to wear around the house, which is what I wanted them for. Had i gotten my size I'm sure i would have gotten just a bit more support than what i get now. For reference, I'm a size 46 DD. If you're around this range do yourself a a favor and get the 5x. I would definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: so comfortable I wear them all the time
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable you don't even know you have one on. I like the colors and the comfort. They are inexpensive and great for daily wear. I would like them too add more size to the cup size and not just the bottom band. It does not need to be any bigger. But the Cub could use a little more room. I have a shoulder problem and this does not pull on it at all. As I said the cup size is a little small. If you are large busted you might want to buy the next larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Kodo

customer_reviews.title: Not flattering
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and bought an enormous size, and the breat part was fine. However, the long elastic below the cup is like wearing spanx over just the top of your belly - nowhere for the fat to go but down, enlarging your lower belly. Think of squeezing a balloon at one end. I am only about 10 pounds overweight and I looked like I was pregnant and carrying low. AVOID THIS PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: Macguff

customer_reviews.title: Product has changed from previous orders
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this item many, many times. They have been the best. Now the product is useless as an undergarment. First the bottom band measurement is 3” wider than the previous bras. The band has little elasticity and is absolutely non holding. The overall fabric has also changed. It no longer has a pattern knit in to the entire unit which seemed to have given it strength. So dissatisfied, Shirley Niro
customer_reviews.author: Shirley M. Niro

customer_reviews.title: Nice bra but the bottom band rolling is a bummer.
customer_reviews.text: The bra fits nicely. I am 210 pounds with pretty small breasts so it's not easy to find the right bra. The bra is a lovely color pink and material feels nice. Unfortunately the band at the bottom rolls like a new years party favor and it makes the bra very uncomfortable. Another bra for the no go pile. This bra may be better for people that are more proportional.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly 390

customer_reviews.title: Welcome to Comfort Town!
customer_reviews.text: Roomy and Stretchy. A decent amount of support, but not something you take to the gym. They are a nice everyday bra and I am slowly transitioning my bras to this type of material. I have ordered three of theses. The back panel is quite wider than a traditional bra which helps it to stay put. I have not had any issues with them rolling up. Good price too!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort buy if you’re top-heavy
customer_reviews.text: The sizing is interesting on here, but the sizing chart is accurate so that’s a plus. I’m very broad and relatively large chested, and these bras don’t necessarily offer the best support (which I expected), but they’re very comfortable for lounging or just working around the house—they’re quite comfortable. I wouldn’t wear them to exercise in. Definitely a comfort buy for top-heavy ladies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Great for comfort and nursing.
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for comfortable bras for nursing. Having H cups and trying to find nursing bras has been a challenge. I bought 2 of these bras and plan on getting more colors. They are so very comfortable and have decent support. Soft and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Haddad

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculous sizing! Don't bother ordering this product!!!
customer_reviews.text: This bra is an actual joke. I ordered the 5xl which is supposed to fit someone who wears a 48dd. The band measures 30 inches around. I'm absolutely disgusted with Hanes for putting their name on this laughable product. I'm even more disgusted that I know have to make a special trip to return this joke that's made to fit a 34c at best. It's a waste of my time and my gas. Don't bother ordering this product!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: loulou

customer_reviews.title: Size guide on this product is useless
customer_reviews.text: This picture shows a 3x over a 6x. Honestly this was the most difficult bra to find my size in. The size guide provided is useless. I normal wear 3x in sport bras. When the 3x arrived it looked like something a very thin 12 year old might wear. I automatically requested a refund and bought a 6x. Basically the difference is 2cm added around the "band" and longer shoulder straps. So I tried on the 3x I hadn't yet sent back. This bra is "fine." I wouldn't say it's comfortable. I wouldn't reccomend it. It stretcheds more than it appears. It's on the less expensive side. I wouldn't want to wear it all day.
customer_reviews.author: WildTb15

customer_reviews.title: Just "no."
customer_reviews.text: The bra was comfy enough. I bought the beautiful fuchsia-colored bra and it turned my skin bright red! When I washed the fabric dye off my skin, I was left with contact dermatitis under my bust and wrapping around my back. How does that even happen? I expect better quality control from such an established company.
customer_reviews.author: KDM

customer_reviews.title: So comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I read so many negative reviews about this bra that I wasn't sure if I wanted to order it, but I am so glad that I did. The fit was perfect. It is snug enough to hold the girls in place and I don't have it riding up or the straps digging into my shoulders. Generally I am the type of woman that takes her bra off as soon as I get home from work. With this bra being so comfortable I keep it on until it's time to go to bed. Great bra for the price. Will definitely be purchasing again!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable bra for moderate exercise and everyday wear.
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying these bras for about four years now, and I wear them almost everyday. They are very comfortable for everyday wear. I also wear them for moderate-intensity exercise and find that they offer good support while remaining completely comfortable. I wash them with my cotton clothes and run them through the drying machine; though eventually the stitching in the bottom hem breaks down and they loose their support due to the elasticity breaking down, I easily get 30-40 washes before that happens. The item arrived exactly as pictured in the product listing.
customer_reviews.author: 12 Paw Ranch

customer_reviews.title: Too small!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These run super small. I wear a 2x size in regular sized sports bras and the like. So I thought surely a 2x in plus size would work! And I even used the measuring guide. Nope. It’s tiny. The band that’s supposed to be around my middle is cupping my boobs. If I raise my arms up the whole sha-bang is gonna fall out. Wow. They really need to work on their fit.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea R Kellim

customer_reviews.title: Scared of sizing
customer_reviews.text: I was really worried about the sizing based on previous reviews but it fits great. I wear a 48F and got a 6x. I will probably size down on the next one. Lots of room in the shoulder straps. Not much support but that’s what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Love this bra!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a sleep bra because I am nursing and needed something to keep nursing pads in place. I am a 42I and I was really worried about the sizing. I bought the 3x and it fits great! I don't fall out the top or sides. It's not super supportive but I like that it's not a racerback. Racerbacks put too much pressure on my back and it aches in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Wethington

customer_reviews.title: Warning on size!
customer_reviews.text: The material is nice and straps are wide but I wear a 2 to 3 x in everything in underwear and clothing. I pulled this size 4x on from the bottom and it is very very tight! and uncomfortable . I got the 4x as I had not worn this brand before and I will never order this again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Clark

customer_reviews.title: RUNS EXTRA SMALL
customer_reviews.text: Way too small!!! Their sizing chart is sooo wrong. I’m a 4x and based off the reviews, I got a 6x because I knew it ran small. But I could barely get it on so had to return it. I asked my friend what size the bra looked like (without knowing what size it actually was) and he said an XL! What a joke!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Great price,  great fit & colors,  fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy I found these bras online. I can't stand anything snug around my ribcage/boob area and these are so much cheaper than the brand-name "Ahh bra" I had been buying and they come in larger sizes. I like to order this kind of bra a couple sizes up so it's not snug at all. These are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia NY

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is small
customer_reviews.text: I am glad I read other reviews. I wear a size 42DDD and ordered 4X. Actually, I could have used a 5X. The fabric is as advertised and is thin. Very comfortable and I will order more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incorrectly sized but good bra.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the size recommended by company. It is too small, the long added band under bust rolls up. Disappointed. Update- purchased the next size up and ot is perfect. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Carty

customer_reviews.title: Nice support.
customer_reviews.text: I love these bras for when you don't want that back bulge showing through your clothing or you just want to be more comfortable. These don't give me the old "uniboob", but I do use bra pads that I bought through Amazon when I want a little more coverage. Either way it's very comfortable. Also great for when I have to have medical test that require no metal in your clothing.
customer_reviews.author: K. Roth

customer_reviews.title: No uniboob. Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t understand all the complaints about it being too small. I wore a 42DD and the 2x was perfect. I had weight loss surgery 4 months after the purchase, and this bra has taken me through 85 pounds of weight loss, and now I’m in a 38C and my breasts fall out from underneath. LOL. For me, it was the perfect solution as I lost weight. Now I’m going to go get fitted for a good quality, more structured bra since I’m within 25 pounds of my final goal weight. I also ordered a 1x in this for around the house, but it’s too big now.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but hot!
customer_reviews.text: This comfort bra is very comfortable. I wear a 44C and 3X fit is just right. It stays put pretty well, no feeling like its creeping up to strangle me. The one big issue that will likely keep me from wearing it in summer is that I perspire under my breasts and the fabric this bra is made from does not breathe. The front of the band was soaked when I took it off the first day I wore it and it wasn't even hot and humid. I will save it for winter and stick to cotton sports bras for summer.
customer_reviews.author: LindaKTop Contributor: Calligraphy

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: When I first opened the package and saw the bra I thought for sure it wouldn't stretch to fit and that if I got it on it wouldn't hold 'the girls' in or up. I am happy to say I was wrong! This is so soft and lightweight you barely feel it on but it is surprisingly supportive and extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Howard

customer_reviews.title: Size guide is no help. Went up a size and was still too small.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 46dd and went by the size guide on listing. I even went up a size to the 5x that claims it fit a 50d just to be sure. It is way too small and barely fit my mother who is a 40c.
customer_reviews.author: Peanutsmom2005

customer_reviews.title: Buying more
customer_reviews.text: It is so comfortable...really. I guess I'm mid size, typical middle aged woman and so the fit is so perfect AND I think it looks sexy. I wanted something easier than a bra since with COVID we are stuck in the house all day, to wear with pjs etc but still provides COVERAGE. This does. I'm ordering more right now. Might never wear a regular bra again. Got 1X. Am 40D.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta V

customer_reviews.title: Order True to Size?
customer_reviews.text: The “size chart” available for this product at the time I ordered showed no correlation to the bra sizes available for purchase. I bought a 5x - it's way too large. The seller will allow me to return the item but I would be responsible for return shipping - that does not seem right considering they are not helpful with providing an accurate sizing guide.
customer_reviews.author: Giraffe Girl

customer_reviews.title: The wife loves em.
customer_reviews.text: The wife loves these. She had been complaining about uncomfortable bras with underwire and other issues for some time so I bought her one of these to try. Since then I have bought her several more and these are the only bras she wears. I am surprised that she hasn't burned the old ones yet. And to be honest, they do look really good on her.
customer_reviews.author: burroloco7

customer_reviews.title: Size waaaay up and really consider the fabric
customer_reviews.text: I bought. 4x as a guess. I'm normally a 1x. It's still barely fits, but not so uncomfortable as to not wear it. It has, however, a very uncomfortable and not breathable fabric. This is going away for cooler weather. Hot weather needs a more wicking,absorbent fabric.
customer_reviews.author: P. Strong

customer_reviews.title: Ordered two different colors. The gray is fine, but I fall out of the nude!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t understand how one bra can be fine, and the other I fall out of. The gray bra is comfortable. It’s of course not great support, but works for around the house. I washed them both the same, didn’t wear one more than the other. Really disappointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: WendyM

customer_reviews.title: Wear a 3X order 6X
customer_reviews.text: Too small. I wear a 3X and I read where someone said hers was too small so I ordered a 5X. I should have ordered a 6x. And the straps are too wide so the roll. If you buy one step into it. I tried pulling it over my head and it rolled up under my arms. I have shoulder pain and couldn't pull it down. My husband had to pull it down in the back first.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Ballard

customer_reviews.title: So Comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: I already have some of these and I love them! They don't in my opinion give enough support to go out running around in or do any physical activity in, but for something light weight to wear around the house or sleep in they are wonderful! For me they are true to fit by following the sizing chart. I'm sure since they are made for us more well endowed girls that eventually the shoulder straps will stretch out and since they are not adjustable they'll have to be replaced quicker than a normal bra, but for the price I'm not complaining. Very soft and comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Hippiecowgirl

customer_reviews.title: Finally a bra that fits comfortably!
customer_reviews.text: This bra is very comfortable. at first it may stick to your skin and cause a little discomfort underneath the arms, that goes away after a few washes. it took me so long to find a plus size bra that actually fit me. I'm going to State it as it is, if you weigh 300lbs and you have large breasts, then this bra is probably going to fit you. I bought the largest size.
customer_reviews.author: Shadow

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy but supports nothing
customer_reviews.text: I'm not going to lie this bra is uber comfy but that's probably about it. I ordered the 5x, I wear a 50G usually. Taking the bra out of the package, I was sure it wouldn't fit but it can hella stretch, it'd stretch to fit if you're bigger around and it's comfortable. But the fabric is thin which I'm guessing would make it breathable. This bra will not hide your protruding nipples if you get cold and it's slightly see through. This bra lightly holds your boobs in which I mean it gives them absolutely no shape except flat against you. I wouldn't dare run with bra but I definitely would clean house in it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Govier

customer_reviews.title: Runs Small
customer_reviews.text: can't believe this is a 5X. Only ordered that size since the 4X I have is also small. I am not normally a 5X. Who comes up with these sizes; certainly not American women.
customer_reviews.author: MICHELE'S MOM

customer_reviews.title: Good Bra!
customer_reviews.text: I play competitive women's basketball and other bra's I've worn are too hot and sweaty as well as hard to get on. I have found these bras to be a great fit for my playing and other exercises. They move with me and are light weight. However, despite the lite weight feel they stay in place and provide a lot of support. The band does not roll like other bras I have used. These are the best sports bras I have found for active play and exercise.
customer_reviews.author: RockyBird34

customer_reviews.title: Just carefully read through the reviews first!
customer_reviews.text: After reading carefully through the reviews I went with a 4X and it’s perfect. I normally wear a 38F but am 7 months pregnant working from home and needed more comfort. This is great for sleeping and around the house, so comfortable!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Travis

customer_reviews.title: White fits-Nude does not!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these bras; 1 in nude and 1 in white. The white was a perfect fit, the nude was lose and does not fit the same. Offers no support but comfortable wearing around the house or while working in garden. I purchased another white bra but will not purchase the nude again.
customer_reviews.author: Deezigns

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, affordable and true to size.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. True to fit, not too tight, helps keeps the boobs at bay. Gained a lot of weight recently and all my 4x strech bras from Walmart are worsening my underarm fat folds, this bra is comfortable and I can wear it all day without wanting to rip it off. I can even sleep in it without pain. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Shana Angel

customer_reviews.title: Cheated
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one of these in black, 4x, and liked it a lot. But I thought a 5x might be more comfortable. Black was not available in 5x so I ordered the cactus pink. When they arrived they were marked 5x but they were not larger but much SMALLER! What a disappointment. I felt cheated. Scammed.
customer_reviews.author: AUNT BUNNY

customer_reviews.title: My New Favorite Bra
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite bra. I can no longer wear underwires so have been looking for something to replace an ill fitting Ahh bra. I am a 42 DD and this fits great. I also bought it in a 5x and it fit as well. The straps stay put and the back covers any rolls you may have. There are no pads but I don't show through. I love this bra!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bras! I have had issues with shoulder pain from traditional bras. These are great and don't put pressure on my shoulders. They wick away moisture and are so comfortable. The stretch provides really good support. Only negative is sometimes they rub a bit in my armpit area since they do have full coverage. Worth it not to have the "armpit cleavage".
customer_reviews.author: Wynnie

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Enough support for wearing shopping (I'm a B cup) and comfy enough to lounge around in. Doesn't lose it's shape or support after multiple washings. The very wide back and side band is fantastic at smoothing that nasty "roll" that forms when you are carrying a bit too much weight! Stretches enough to accommodate a fluctuation in size when you are losing weight (or gaining).
customer_reviews.author: AnnT

customer_reviews.title: Same product for a higher price
customer_reviews.text: This product in XL or XXL is identical to the XL or XXL version of Hanes Cozy Wire-Free Bra. The only difference is that Just My Size Women's Pure Comfort Plus Size Bra costs 30% more than Hanes Cozy Wire-Free Bra. I guess it's a fat tax?
customer_reviews.author: ms smith

customer_reviews.title: Two as one
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased several of these. There seems to be two different compositions The most noticeable is one has a design in the weave of the cups and one has no design. The ones with no design are a perfect fit, but when I am sent the ones with the design, they are more tightly woven in the cup which is ok, but they are also one size smaller around, which makes the band roll up, is uncomfortable, and I end up not being able to wear it all day. I've found the same thing if I buy in store. There are two different bras being sold as #1263.
customer_reviews.author: D Albert

product_meta.title: Just My Size Women's Pure Comfort Plus Size Bra (1263)
product_meta.description: Pull it on or step right in. Either way, this Just My Size bra feels blissfully soft and comfy.
feature_bullets: Silky seamless fabric stretches four ways for flexible fit. Plus it wicks away moisture to keep you cool and dry.
Knit-in light support adds subtle under-bust shaping.
Wide straps and fuller back offer gentle all-around smoothing.
Wider bottom band helps prevent dig-in and roll-up.
